TrustExpression: ( TIP_1 AND TD_1 AND TD_2 AND ( TIP_2 OR TIP_3 } AND TIP_4 ) OR TIP_5
Description: This Trust Interoperability Profile specifies NIST 800-63 LOA 4 requirements on subscriber registration and credential issuance by CSPs. This TIP is equivalent to the NIST 800-63 LOA 4 Registration and Issuance Profile, with the sole exception being that this TIP does not allow the use of derived credentials.

TrustInteroperabilityProfileReferences.Name: NIST 800-63 Registration Baseline Profile
TrustInteroperabilityProfileReferences.Description: This Trust Interoperability Profile specifies NIST 800-63 requirements on CSP registration of subscribers.

TrustInteroperabilityProfileReferences.Name: NIST 800-63 LOA 4 Identity Proofing and Credential Issuance Profile
TrustInteroperabilityProfileReferences.Description: This Trust Interoperability Profile specifies NIST 800-63 LOA 4 requirements on identity proofing of registration applicants and credential issuance by CSPs.

TrustInteroperabilityProfileReferences.Name: NIST 800-63 LOA 4 Identity Proofing and Credential Issuance by Employers of Licensed Professionals Profile
TrustInteroperabilityProfileReferences.Description: This Trust Interoperability Profile specifies NIST 800-63 LOA 3 requirements on identity proofing of registration applicants and credential issuance by CSPs, where the subscribers are licensed professionals and employees or affiliates of the CSP.

TrustInteroperabilityProfileReferences.Name: NIST 800-63 LOA 3 and 4 In-Person Applicant Tracking Profile
TrustInteroperabilityProfileReferences.Description: This Trust Interoperability Profile specifies NIST 800-63 LOA 3 and 4 requirements on in-person tracking of registration applicants by CSPs.

TrustInteroperabilityProfileReferences.Name: NIST 800-63 LOA 4 Registration and Issuance for Financial Institutions Profile
TrustInteroperabilityProfileReferences.Description: This Trust Interoperability Profile specifies NIST 800-63 LOA 4 requirements on CSP registration of subscribers and credential issuance, for CSPs that are financial institutions that are required, by government oversight such as the Bank Secrecy Act, the USA Patriot Act, the Office of the Comptroller of the Currency, the Federal Financial Institutions Examination Council, or the Securities and Exchanges Commission, to implement a "Customer Identification Program".

TrustmarkDefinitionReference.Name: Registration of Verified Subscriber Names
TrustmarkDefinitionReference.Description: This Trustmark Definition covers requirements on Credential Service Providers (CSPs) and their Registration Authority (RA) designees for registering verified subscriber names.

TrustmarkDefinitionReference.Name: Registration Applicant Biometric Recording for Non-Repudiation of Registration Application
TrustmarkDefinitionReference.Description: This Trustmark Definition covers the use of biometrics to obtain non-repudiation of subscribers' registrations, by Credential Service Providers (CSPs) and their Registration Authority (RA) designees.

Name: FICAM LOA 4 Registration and Issuance Profile
